author: lihux25
body:
This is a first PR for a new packer for HCAL phase I software development. This packer can now pack the QIE10, QIE11 as well QIE8 data.

The packer is intended to replace the current HcalPacker, but we plan to test it thoroughly before we enable it (currently not enabled).
title: First PR for new HCAL packer
